title: S2 E06: The Mayor, the Barber, and the Babysitter
description:
Coleman Young has more underworld connections than you might expect of a big-city mayor. Sometimes those connections come in handy. But when his favorite niece starts dating an infamous drug dealer, Mayor Young must choose between keeping her out of trouble and keeping his hands clean.  
For bonus content from this episode, visit crimetownshow.com. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:title: The Mayor, the Barber, and the Babysitter
itunes:author: Gimlet
itunes:subtitle: Coleman Young rose from the streets to become mayor of Detroit. Now, his old connections are coming back to haunt him.
